allow: Bash(# Check for any chart widgets find /c/xampp/www/knowledgemcp/app/Filament -name ""*Widget*"" -o -name ""*Chart*"")

Bash(# Check what the browser actually receives and renders curl -s ""http://localhost:8099/"" 2>&1 | grep -oP ''data-page=""[^""]*""'' | head -1 | python3 -c ""import sys,html,json; d=html.unescape\(sys.stdin.read\(\).replace\(''data-page=\\""'',''''\).rstrip\(''\\""''\)\); print\(json.dumps\(json.loads\(d\),indent=2\)\)"" || curl -s ""http://localhost:8099/"" 2>&1)

Bash(# Restart server and verify nonce appears on script tags taskkill //F //IM ""php.exe"" sleep 1 cd c:/xampp/www/knowledgemcp && php artisan serve --port=8099 &>/dev/null & sleep 3 curl -s ""http://localhost:8099/"" 2>&1)
